derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: modern Latin, from Greek rhodon 'rose' (from the colour of the solution of its salts)

means.word_mean: 1. a white hard metallic element that is one of the platinum group and is found in platinum ores; used in alloys with platinum
